params.name: title
params.description: Title to be displayed on the do and don't list component..

params.name: type
params.description: Type of do and don't list component, "cross", "tick"

params.name: items
params.description: Array of do and dont items objects.

params.name: item
params.description: Text to use within each do and dont item label.

params.name: hidePrefix
params.description: If set to true when type is "cross", then removes the default "do not" text prefix to each item

params.name: headingLevel
params.description: Optional heading level for the title heading. Default: 3

params.name: classes
params.description: Classes to add to the details element.

params.name: attributes
params.description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the details element.
